room_title: Escape room "Japanese Thriller Room" by Music City Escape Room in Nashville
review: The host was high energy and upbeat which made the experience a lot of fun.  The rooms themselves where of adequate quality, if a tiny bit on the low end (but just right for the price range per entry).  Almost all of the puzzles weren't so cryptic that after you used a clue you wondered how anyone would figure it out.  The best part of the room is the very small  theatrics they add to it.  I recommend it for the price.

room_title: Escape room "Japanese Thriller Room" by Music City Escape Room in Nashville
review: Very fun and good puzzles! We actually ended up escaping- Alyssa was an awesome host! She kept the energy high and was a lot of fun!

room_title: Escape room "Japanese Thriller Room" by Music City Escape Room in Nashville
review: We had so much fun here doing the Japanese Room. Rachel made it so challenging but was such a help the entire time. Made the experience that much better! Highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Japanese Thriller Room" by Music City Escape Room in Nashville
review: Ryan was great and very helpful

room_title: Escape room "Japanese Thriller Room" by Music City Escape Room in Nashville
review: Rachel and adam were the best !!! Had a blast

room_title: Escape room "Japanese Thriller Room" by Music City Escape Room in Nashville
review: We had a good time. We did the Japanese room and Rachel was our leader and helped when needed. Will definitely be back.

room_title: Escape room "Japanese Thriller Room" by Music City Escape Room in Nashville
review: This was our first escape room experience and we loved it! We did the Japanese Thriller room and it was so fun! Rachel was our game master and she was awesome! We will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Japanese Thriller Room" by Music City Escape Room in Nashville
review: We had a great time! Jessica and Bonnie made the experience fun and exciting. We were grouped with some ladies from Indiana and they were a blast! We did the Japanese Thriller room and I am excited to return to do the other 2 rooms!
